md:
giải nghĩa từ "bitter" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Bitter (adjective)
	+ Meaning: having a strong, unpleasant taste
	+ Vietnamese: đắng
	+ Example sentence: The coffee was bitter, so I added some sugar.
	+ Related words: sweet, sour, salty

* Bitter (adjective)
	+ Meaning: feeling or showing anger or resentment
	+ Vietnamese: cay đắng
	+ Example sentence: She was bitter about the way she was treated at her old job.
	+ Related words: angry, resentful, upset

* Bitter (noun)
	+ Meaning: a bitter substance, especially a bitter-tasting plant or part of a plant
	+ Vietnamese: chất đắng
	+ Example sentence: The bitters in the cocktail added a complex flavor.
	+ Related words: sweet, sour, herb

Note: The word "bitter" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used. The above definitions and examples are just a few of the possible meanings of the word.
